name: Logos Directive
description:
We made this game in a week for the SGDA Summer Jam 2022, with the theme "Game Over Isn't The End". After killing the mediator of an alien crew you ran into during a space journey, you need to pass their trials in order to be offered a way home.

Credits

Alessia Fontecchio- Lead Artist (Rel and Nil) and Writing (Nil)

Anooj Vadodkar - Programmer and Writing (Rel)

Meghna Anil - Artist and Writing (Emperia)

Asset Credits: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ZBI1t9lutDNNtedY10yzv-aDfj6any4ui7M5eH1vKpc/...
